author: lightclient
content: Somewhat related to above, what do people generally use to monitor the health of the chain? I'd really like to set up a grafana dashboard to keep an eye on things like txs per block, average gas price, storage slots written / read, new accounts, etc.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Geth has the `--metric` flag to enable collection of a lot of those metrics and you can easily add more to the code.
Docs for that can be found here: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/22030
These metrics can be written into an influxdb to be read by grafana.
We might be able to share our grafana config for displaying the most useful/important metrics.
